thread.title: GH Recap: Someone catches Olivia Jerome with Julian
thread.title_full: GH Recap: Someone catches Olivia Jerome with Julian

title: GH Recap: Someone catches Olivia Jerome with Julian
text:
GH Recap: Someone catches Olivia Jerome with Julian 
Dustin Cushman Thursday, February 2nd, 2017 
Thursday February 2, 2017: Franco is released from the hospital, Ned and Oliva have different ideas, Curtis is disappointed by Jordan, and Olivia pressures Julian. Pin 
Ned and Olivia get frisky on the Quartermaine couch when Dillon walks in and ruins the moment. Olivia realizes she needs to go pick up Leo. Ned wishes she would consider moving in here with Leo, but Olivia refuses. After she leaves, Ned opens up to Dillon about Olivia not wanting to move in. Dillon gets frank with his brother and counts down the list of his marriages, which are likely red flags to her. Ned realizes he can’t let Olivia get away, and starts thinking he should propose. 
At the PCPD, Andre walks up on Jordan while she’s on the phone trying to convince the new DA that Sonny is innocent, but the woman hangs up on her. Jordan tells Andre she has something to tell him, but Andre interrupts her before she can speak. Andre apologizes for once again being selfish and giving her a hard time for leaving the wedding. She apologizes if she made him feel she hasn’t been choosing him. Curtis interrupts them, so Andre decides to leave them to work. Curtis hopes he proved himself to Jordan so that he can get his badge back. However, Jordan refuses to hire him and says he’ll need to find another department to work for. Curtis accuses her of wanting him to leave town so he doesn’t end up in her bed. Jordan slaps him. He promises her that he’s not leaving town no matter what. 
Related: Is One Life to Live's Hillary B. Smith Port Charles' new DA? 
Sam and Jason drop by Sonny’s to see him. Carly is there they fill her in on the investigation before she leaves. Sam also departs to meet her mom. Once alone, Jason informs Sonny that he will find Morgan’s killer, but he’s going to deliver them to the police. Jason receives a call from Curtis, who tells Jason he’s ready to help him again if he still wants him. 
At Alexis’ place, Julian tells Alexis that he’s going to be moving back to Ava’s now that he’s sober. Alexis has to go out to see Sam, and she has some other things to do, so she leaves. Later as Julian is about to go, Olivia turns up at Alexis’ place. He orders her out, but she says she doesn’t take orders from him. She needs a status report on Jason. Julian explains that Jason has bowed out of the investigation to protect his family. She is pleased and asks what is going on with GH 
At GH, Franco wakes up and finds Liz by his side. She tells him while he was out Scott and Kiki dropped by. He also got a call from Heather and Ava even sent him flowers with a card that reads, “Get well, you did good.” Later, Alexis drops by to see Franco, so Liz gives them time alone. Alexis lets Franco know that she owes him for what he did for her, and this is one of her steps. He simply asks her not to forget that she’s the only one working on atonement. Meanwhile, Sam shows up at the nurse’s station looking for her mom. Liz tells her that she’s talking to Franco. Liz thanks Sam for finding Franco, but Sam thinks they are even because it was Liz who made her see the trouble her mom was in. After some time, Liz tells Franco he’s been released, and she invites him to come home with her. He accepts her offer. Back in the hall, Sam meets with her mom and tells her that she and Danny are going to be taking a trip out of town for a while, a vacation, and suggests Alexis come with them. Alexis can’t because of her program. Later, Sam runs into Franco when Liz leaves him by the elevator because she forgot something. Sam thanks Franco for not turning his mother in, but lets him know this doesn’t make up for what he did to her. 
More: Upcoming fan events with Michael Easton (Dr. Finn) and Roger Howarth (Franco) 
Carly and Olivia meet in the park to warn her that Julian is involved in something bad, so be careful for Leo’s sake. Olivia switches the topic to Ned’s invite, which excites Carly as she thinks he wants to marry her. Oliva thinks Carly is way off here, at least she hopes she is. Olivia vents about her track record with men. She says she and Leo are doing fine on their own. 
Back at Alexis’ place, Julian tells his sister that he's been targeting members of the GH board, but Tracy is pushing back. She warns him not to disappoint her. Suddenly Alexis walks in and finds them together. 
Jason, Sonny and Curtis meet with Brick. 
Bobbie tells Joss that Nelle has a boyfriend. 
Nelle gets flowers at work, which Felicia takes note of. 
Liz and Franco grow closer. 
Alexis asks Olivia and Julian what is going on.
